sections.instructor: Wilson, James, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: Attendance at one or more live performances is required. Note: Partially online course with required meetings Mondays, 11:10 AM-12:35 PM (on-campus, see room on schedule) with all other  instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
